name: Welcome
message: Good {timeOfDay} {firstName}, and welcome to {company}! Room {roomNumber} is now ready for you. Enjoy your stay, and let us know if you need anything.

name: Goodbye
message: Good {timeOfDay} {firstName} {lastName}! We hope you enjoyed your stay in Room {roomNumber}. We hope you stay with {company} in the future!

name: MidWay Check In
message: Good {timeOfDay} {firstName} {lastName}! We wanted to check in with you and make sure you are enjoying your stay with {company}. Please contact the front desk if you need anything!
